channel.title: Litle problem with modulation
channel.description:
hello, i try to make simple delay stereo. i use 2 mixers of 2 tracks on each mixers (mix2 audio) one track for dry, one track for wet. i put the knobs for dry completly up and the knobs for wet completly down. i want modulate this four knobs with one dial. And then i add "dial p" and modsource.
On the two dry knobs i define -64 for the modulation1 and for the two wet knobs i define +64 modulation1.
i test it and it work! cool. i put the dial modulator "parameter on parent", i save my patch like subpatch, i create new patch re-open my subpatch like object, i connect my delay to the input and output. and now when i move the dial modulator (dry/wet) i can only hear the dry sound.. i don't understand, i don't know where is my error. may be some one can take look my patch please. :slight_smile:
thanks by advance and sorry for my english i hope you understand my blabla :grin:
[My Patch](https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B_hfRZ740YbmekYyR0F6d2JjM2s)
Edit: Oups may be is not the good place for this post.. sorry

item.title: Litle problem with modulation
item.dc:creator: @Sputnki Filippo Tamagnini
item.description:
@Sputnki wrote:

there's an xfade object that does exactly what you need. and it's directly controllable with a positive blue signal

Read full topic

item.title: Litle problem with modulation
item.dc:creator: @dric Franchetti cedric
item.description:
@dric wrote:

hello, i try to make simple delay stereo. i use 2 mixers of 2 tracks on each mixers (mix2 audio) one track for dry, one track for wet.
i put the knobs for dry completly up and the knobs for wet completly down.
i want modulate this four knobs with one dial. And then i add "dial p" and modsource.

On the two dry knobs i define -64 for the modulation1 and for the two wet knobs i define +64 modulation1.

i test it and it work! cool. i put the dial modulator "parameter on parent", i save my patch like subpatch, i create new patch re-open my subpatch like object, i connect my delay to the input and output. and now when i move the dial modulator (dry/wet) i can only hear the dry sound.. i don't understand, i don't know where is my error.
may be some one can take look my patch please.

thanks by advance and sorry for my english i hope you understand my blabla
